CustomField.formula:
IF( Number_Of_NoActions__c > 0 , IMAGE("/resource/OrangeCase","",20,20) + ' ',IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20))&
IF( Number_Of_Blocks__c > 0 , IMAGE("/resource/RedCase","",20,20) + ' ', IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20))&
IF( Number_Of_Malfunctions__c > 0 , IMAGE("/resource/YellowCase","",20,20) + ' ',IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20))&
IF( Number_Of_Serviceables__c > 0, IMAGE("/resource/BlueCase","",20,20) + ' ',IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20))
CustomField.label: Aircraft Case Status
